titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation to inhibite the sale of Latine bookes reprinted beyond the seas, hauing been first printed in Oxford or Cambridge.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Concerning sale of imported Latin books in Oxford and Cambridge--STC.
Dated at end: S. Iames, the first day of April, in the first yeere of our reigne ... .
Arms 21; Steele notation: of Authors 2) ho- all.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
